sections.title: Annex J — Mediation Rules
bullets: Mediation procedure and timelines; documented outcome report becomes part of the contract file.
Good‑faith participation is recorded in the Register and supports escalation decisions.

sections.title: Annex K — Transparency Protocol
bullets: Continuous traceability: communications, actions, and financial transactions are logged and time‑stamped.
Two synced registers (Publisher operations / Author oversight) with role-based access and non-deletion.

sections.title: Annex L — Operational Compliance Checklist
bullets: Defines the minimum operational setup for the Register (secure environment) and workflow proof.
Exports (CSV/PDF) count as official audit documents; versioning required.

sections.title: Annex M — Framework→Contract Mapping Overview
bullets: Used as a verification checklist; deviations must be recorded and referenced in the Register.
After approval, mapping supports evidentiary value and closing certification.
